name: Somnium Angelus
description:
Somnium Angelus is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 2022 by SisterSoft

Enter the dreams of 3 girls to find them and bring them to their home on the moon...

Controls (Controller Recommended):

  • D-Pad/Arrows: Move forward, back, and turn left and right
  • Bottom Face Button/Key Z: Interact when halo chimes and glows blue
  • Bumpers/Keys A+D: Turn the camera left and right
  • Triggers/Keys Q+E: Move the camera up and down
  • Top Face Button/Key S: Snap camera to current direction
